'''Waters of Lethe''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during the {{Quest|Lotus Eater}}.

==Trivia==
* The {{w|Lethe|River Lethe}} is one of the five rivers of the underworld in Greek mythology. Drinking from it would cause forgetfulness, and the spirits of the dead would drink from it before being reincarnated.
